text: (He paigambara!) Manisaharula'i bud'dhimatta ra asala upadesale aphno palanakartako batotira bola'unus ra sadhai ramro tarikale tiniharusita kura garnus, jo usako batobata vicalita chan tapa'iko palanakartale tinala'i pani ramrari jandacha ra jo sahi margama hidneharu chan uniharula'i pani ramrari jandacha
